hackathon-description-text: Smart Glass and Wearables will be enabling innovation across many industries in the coming years, one such field is Education. Entangled Ventures has a special interest in seeing leaps forward in Education using technologies like Google Glass. Let's see how we can enable teachers and students with Glass!

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: $1000 cash, up to 5 HTC One (M7) phones (one per team member), Metaio SDK ($3500 value)
$1000 cash, 2 tickets to Wearable Technologies Conference ($890 value each), 1 ticket to GGDevCon ($895 value)

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=543 Howard Street, San Francisco, CA 94105, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: This should provide a good user experience on Glass specifically. Glass is not a phone, or a PC.

hackathon-location-address: 543 Howard Street, San Francisco, CA 94105, USA
hackathon-description-header: Come hack with us! The weekend before Google I/O 2014, we are holding a 24 hour hackathon to build Glassware for Education.
